ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A 'ggplot2' extension that focusses on expanding the plotter's arsenal of guides. Guides in 'ggplot2' include axes and legends. 'legendry' offers new axes and annotation options, as well as new legends and colour displays.

A 'ggplot2' extension that focusses on expanding the plotter's arsenal of guides. Guides in 'ggplot2' include axes and legends. 'legendry' offers new axes and annotation options, as well as new legends and colour displays.

name: r-legendry
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-legendry
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/legendry_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/legendry/legendry_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2ed280a3eaef8f85ae30e593b2987dba636e711b52bec6eb2956c130360050b7

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.5.2
    - r-gtable
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-rlang >=1.1.0
    - r-scales >=1.1.1
    - r-vctrs >=0.6.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.5.2
    - r-gtable
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-rlang >=1.1.0
    - r-scales >=1.1.1
    - r-vctrs >=0.6.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('legendry')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('legendry')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://teunbrand.github.io/legendry/, https://github.com/teunbrand/legendry
  license: MIT
  summary: A 'ggplot2' extension that focusses on expanding the plotter's arsenal of guides. Guides in 'ggplot2' include axes and legends. 'legendry' offers new axes and annotation options, as well as new legends and colour displays.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ning-y

# Package: legendry
# Title: Extended Legends and Axes for 'ggplot2'
# Version: 0.2.2
# Authors@R: person("Teun", "van den Brand", , "tahvdbrand@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre", "cph"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-9335-7468"))
# Description: A 'ggplot2' extension that focusses on expanding the plotter's arsenal of guides. Guides in 'ggplot2' include axes and legends. 'legendry' offers new axes and annotation options, as well as new legends and colour displays.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: https://teunbrand.github.io/legendry/, https://github.com/teunbrand/legendry
# BugReports: https://github.com/teunbrand/legendry/issues
# Depends: ggplot2 (>= 3.5.2), R (>= 4.1.0)
# Imports: cli, grid (>= 4.1.0), gtable, lifecycle, rlang (>= 1.1.0), scales (>= 1.1.1), vctrs (>= 0.6.0)
# Suggests: knitr, ragg, rmarkdown, svglite, systemfonts, testthat (>= 3.0.0), vdiffr, withr
# Config/testthat/edition: 3
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 7.3.2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2025-05-30 08:43:17 UTC; Teun
# Author: Teun van den Brand [aut, cre, cph] (ORCID: <https://orcid.org/0000-0002-9335-7468>)
# Maintainer: Teun van den Brand <tahvdbrand@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2025-05-30 09:20:09 UTC
